description: Dynamically create a Data with a specified number of fields.

number_of_fields.info: Number of fields to be added to the record.

text_key.info: Key that identifies the field to be used as the text content.

text_key_validator.info: If enabled, checks if the given 'Text Key' is present in the given 'Data'.

success.data_created: Data object created successfully with {count} fields

errors.invalid_field_count: Invalid field count value. Please enter a valid number.
errors.max_fields_exceeded: Number of fields cannot exceed {max_fields}. Please adjust the number of fields to be within the allowed limit.
errors.data_extraction_failed: Failed to extract data from attributes: {error}
errors.text_key_not_found: Text Key: '{text_key}' not found in the Data keys: '{data_keys}'
